name: No step away!
description:
No step away! is a unique project from CEBEP GAMEDEV. In this game, you need to take on the role of a general and manage your squad. This game is for two players.The game already has a lot of possibilities, including:

  • Buildings capture and trenches digging
  • Stealth system
  • Soldiers ranks
  • Hunger, fear and various debuffs systems
  • A lot of weapons and transport
  • zone modifiers like dark,cold and etc
  • report system
  • Looting system

Tutorial:

  1. First of all, open the store tab and buy soldiers and weapons for them. We recommend taking food as it is essential for survival
  2. After that, go to the units menu and select one of them. Next, press "L" on the keyboard to pick up items from the location where this soldier is located
  3. then go to the units tab and select this soldier again. Below you can see the items in his inventory. press "M" and select the place where you will send the soldier
  4. When you're done issuing orders, press "End Turn" and transfer control to another player
  5. If your soldier collides with the enemy, then you will receive an alert in the reports section. There, the soldier will report where there was a collision with the enemy, whether he was able to win and whether he was wounded or not.
  6. If a soldier disappeared without any warning, then most likely he was killed by an enemy soldier. In this case, the corpse of a soldier will lie at the location where he was killed. If this did not happen, and the second player did not take away the corpse, then inform us in accordance with the paragraph "Bug reports"
  7. If you want to ride a car or horse, then select a soldier, press "V" and select a vehicle or animal. After that, it should appear in the list of units. To ride a horse or ride a car, select it and press "M". Remember, the driver of the car cannot shoot. You can put several people in the same transport,
    depends on transport.
  8. Terrain can play a big role in a battle. In a house or shop, you are harder to spot than in a clearing or road. If the name of a group of zones is preceded by the "DARK" modifier, then soldiers in such a zone are also more difficult to notice. By using the ambush command, you will reduce the chances of being detected.
  9. Do you know why there is a shovel in the game? It can be used to dig trenches. To do this, press "TAB" while selecting a soldier with a shovel in his hands, and he will begin to dig a trench.
  10. In the "Front line" mode, the store is available for the entire battle, and the captured mines give you $500 each turn. To capture the mine, it is enough to stand on the cell with it with any unit.

We apologize in advance for any bugs that may occur during the game. Report all bugs and crashes in this form:

Bug reports:

  • Leave a comment in "Bug reports"
  • Describe what you were doing when the bug occurred.
  • If the game crashes then copy and paste into the blue screen content.
  • If the game freezes, then kill its process, we are working on eliminating friezes

Thanks a lot!
